mapper.select: SELECT r.reserve_idx as id, r.start_datetime as start, r.end_datetime as end, r.subject as title, r.room_idx as room_idx, rm.name as room_name, e.emp_idx as emp_idx, e.name as name, e.depart_idx as depart_idx, e.rank_idx as rank_idx, d.depart_name as depart_name, p.rank_name as rank_name FROM reserve r JOIN employee e ON r.emp_idx = e.emp_idx JOIN department d ON e.depart_idx = d.depart_idx JOIN rank_emp p ON e.rank_idx = p.rank_idx JOIN room rm ON r.room_idx = rm.room_idx WHERE r.start_datetime >= #{startDate} AND r.end_datetime < #{endDate}
select * from room order by room_idx ASC

SELECT r.reserve_idx, r.start_datetime, r.end_datetime, r.subject, r.room_idx, rm.name as room_name, CASE WHEN CONVERT_TZ(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '+00:00', '+09:00') > r.end_datetime THEN '이용 완료' WHEN CONVERT_TZ(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '+00:00', '+09:00') BETWEEN r.start_datetime AND r.end_datetime THEN '이용중' ELSE '변경 가능' END AS status FROM reserve r JOIN room rm ON r.room_idx = rm.room_idx WHERE r.emp_idx = #{loginId} ORDER BY r.reserve_idx DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
